title: Smurfing is the death of league.
body:
I started a new account because i have not played since season 4.

Every single game at level 17 is versing a gold+ Smurfs, or my team is a bunch of leveling bots that are completely useless going 0/50.

Riot, you need to address this problem, and stop putting it off. If a player is caught smurfing, BAN ALL OF THEIR ACCOUNTS.

It is highly unfair to new and returning players to get smashed every single game by players who don't give a single shit about the community.

replies.body:
The issue is not Smurfs or the use of Smurfs, it is the players attitude and how they use the account(s) they create. I know more people with just one account that are total D-Bags and should probably be perma-banned than the number of people I know who have multiple accounts that actually follow the rules and treat other players with respect, and that's saying a lot since a lot of the players I know who use smurfs are somewhat toxic themselves. I myself have 5 accounts (one on NA, but I still consider that a Smurf account) and I've never been punished in-game, because I've never done anything punishment worthy.

What you're doing is stereotyping a group based on (what is likely) a minority, and that seems to be a very common problem with modern society. If I have one thing to say to you it's "don't be *that* guy".

If I'm not mistaken, the system will actually try to identify smurf accounts and match them with other smurf accounts in pre-30 games, which is probably why you ended up with all the other smurfs. If you were new to league and solo-queued you probably would've seen a lot less smurfs.

Yeh, I'm still around. I've taken a few stints off the boards (and LoL in general) throughout the year, but I eventually just figured I was never going to "truly" leave so I'm just here for the ride now...

Damn son, it's good to see another OCE Forums veteran aye?
(btw I _was_ 'airaze')

Smurfs are fine. Call it training with better players. If you lose lane to a smurf you might learn something new. If however your team lost the game, you would have lost anyways.

Win/lose its all fickle. Enjoy the skill of the game.
How about you not spam the boards with the same topic?

Smurfing is not against the terms of use .. Boosting is, My self using a smurf i see no problem, if the person is a Gold+ smurf then he will get his account out of Bronze/ silver/ gold so i dont see the issue ? 

I understand your frustration but put it this way, If you Vs or play with experienced players you'll learn from that and see how they play and use it next time you play, because this is such a small server i wouldn't be surprised if half the people you play with are smurfs. 

Sorry man but its gonna have to be like that unless riot says no more smurfs :)
